Package cs3524.mud

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameSrvrIntfc
    Defines the behaviour of an MUD server.
    MUD
    Defines the behaviour of a world (AKA multi-user domain), within which players can perform simple actions, like traveling between different locations, finding items and seeing other players.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameClient  
    GameServer
    The implementaion of a server, hosting multiple MUDs.
    Item
    Represents an item.
    Location
    Represents a location on a map.
    Path
    Represents a path between two locations.
    Player
    Represents a player in an MUD world.
    Server
    The program to start up an actual server.
    World
    The implementation of a world with locations, paths and players.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    Represents four basic geographical directions: north, east, south, west.
